description: Error message displayed rather that a the plot
I really would like this project to succeed. It has some minor bugs and I encourage the community to help a cleaning the code and add a few more features.
summary: A nice attend to create a friendly data exploration GUI using Python

description: It's quite to understand the functions of some buttons, the GUI could probably be made more intuitive.
summary: Good but could do with some improvements

description: Plotting just stops working at any moment. Feedback output is non existent, and behaves in all sorts of weird ways.

Can't get Open Project and Open Recent to work, keeps wanting to Save Project before anything is even loaded. Have to start a project from scratch every time. Why doesn't the developer fix this? An interesting project and potentially very useful, but too troublesome to waste my time on anymore.
Unable to use the software as the screen text was tiny, the menu was so small, and the icons were like dots. I would have to change my screen resolution to 800 x 600 in order to use it.
It works perfekt and is simple to use! I use it for quick plotting.
summary: Works good for quick data analysis
